meanings.english_definition: A subclass of ribbon worms (Nemertea) in the class Anopla.

etymology.value: From Greek 'protos' (first) + Nemertea (the phylum name) + -ini (zoological suffix indicating a group).

usage_notes.explanation: Used in scientific classification. Relatively uncommon outside of specialist zoological contexts.

readability_explanation.text: This term is highly specialized and used primarily in zoological taxonomy. Understanding requires familiarity with biological classification systems.
